name: DTS Anytime for LGV & PCV Drivers
description: This app is provided exclusively for candidates of LGV and PCV training organisations who are using Driving Test Success (DTS) Anytime.  To get started, simply download the app, login using your Driving Test Success Anytime username and password and start revising all the latest DVSA multiple choice revision questions, OFFLINE using your phone or tablet.  Once youre back online, all of your progress within the app will be uploaded directly to your Driving Test Success Anytime dashboard, so both yourself and your training school can keep a track of your progress.  Due to file size, this app is only suitable for Module 1a (Multiple Choice Theory Test). To prepare for your Module 1b (Hazard Perception) and Module 2 (Driver CPC Case Study Test), please login to your Driving Test Success Anytime online account.  Please note: This is a FREE app, but you do need a valid subscription to Driving Test Success Anytime, sent to you by your LGV or PCV training school.   This app is NOT intended to replace your online training with Driving Test Success Anytime, but will allow you continue your learning when you dont have an internet connection.  For more information visit www.dtsanytime.co.uk.
